alert.note: Alert for Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:38PM EDT until May 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RICHLAND...SOUTHWESTERN MEDINA...ASHLAND AND WESTERN WAYNE COUNTIES... At 338 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mansfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, West Salem, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Sullivan, Spencer, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Congress, Mifflin, Rowsburg, Mohicanville, Nankin, Reedsburg and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
